subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Graig Nettles, the Yankees’ third baseman from 1973 to 1983, served as a consultant for “The Bronx Is Burning,” the ESPN miniseries about the team’s 1977 season.
snippet: Graig Nettles, the Yankees’ third baseman from 1973 to 1983, served as a consultant for “The Bronx Is Burning,” the ESPN miniseries about the team’s 1977 season.
